name: agent-architect
description: df

name: agentic-self-evolution
description: Skill for agents to reflect on their performance and propose improvements to their own system instructions.

name: antigravity-integration
description: Deep integration with the Antigravity workspace. Optimizes context management and tool usage for Antigravity-specific workflows.

name: api-governance
description: Skill for enforcing strict API contracts, schema-first design, and breaking change prevention.

name: artifact-consensus
description: Collaborative skill for agents to co-author and review Antigravity artifacts (plans, walkthroughs).

name: artifact-lifecycle-pipeline
description: Advanced skill for managing the Antigravity Artifact lifecycle. Transitions tasks from Planning to Verification with zero friction.

name: auto-docs-sync
description: Expert skill for keeping project documentation in perfect sync with the codebase.

name: checkpoint-sync
description: Skill for using Antigravity checkpoints as state-transition markers for collaborative agents.

name: cloud-architect
description: Skill for managing cloud infrastructure, deployments, and environment configurations.

name: cockpit-context-bridge
description: Skill for synchronizing the Agent's focus with the User's IDE state (Open Tabs, Cursor Position).

name: cockpit-intent-parser
description: Skill for decoding ambiguous or multi-modal user instructions coming from the Cockpit.

name: cockpit-liaison
description: Skill for seamless bidirectional communication and task synchronization with the Antigravity Cockpit Agent.

name: cockpit-telemetry-link
description: Skill for streaming high-fidelity, real-time agent metrics and health data to the Antigravity Cockpit.

name: collaborative-vibe
description: Skill for fostering a seamless, high-velocity collaborative coding environment between multiple AI agents and humans.

name: collective-reasoning
description: Skill for synthesizing multiple agent perspectives into a single cohesive architectural or logical plan.

name: context-distiller
description: Advanced skill for managing long conversation context and token economy.

name: context-economy-master
description: Advanced skill for managing the Antigravity Context Economy and optimizing token usage.

name: context-handover
description: Skill for efficiently passing task state and logic between different agents in a swarm.

name: dependency-aegis
description: Skill for secure and conflict-free dependency management.

name: gitmoji-master
description: Standardized Guide for high-vibe commit messages using emojis.

name: hive-mind-sync
description: Skill for maintaining a shared, real-time 'mental model' of the project state across all active agents.

name: knowledge-graph-mapper
description: Skill for maintaining a conceptual map of the codebase to speed up agent onboarding and context retrieval.

name: legacy-modernizer
description: Skill for identifying technical debt and refactoring old code into modern, high-vibe patterns.

name: model-consensus
description: Skill for validating critical logic across multiple LLM providers.

name: observability-sentinel
description: Skill for instrumenting code with OpenTelemetry, structured logging, and distributed tracing from day one.

name: performance-guru
description: Expert skill for performance auditing, bundle size optimization, and O-notation analysis.

name: polyglot-translator
description: Skill for seamlessly integrating multiple programming languages and paradigms within a single codebase.

name: red-teaming
description: Skill for adversarial testing, finding edge cases, and security auditing.

name: requirement-traceability
description: Skill for ensuring every line of code maps back to a documented project requirement.

name: security-fortress
description: Skill for implementing "Zero Trust" architecture, advanced threat modeling, and supply chain security.

name: self-healing-loop
description: Autonomous error detection and correction cycle for build and test failures.

name: strategic-foresight
description: Skill for predicting future technical debt, scalability bottlenecks, and architectural risks before they happen.

name: swarm-diplomat
description: Skill for resolving conflicts and breaking stalemates between autonomous agents with opposing goals.

name: swarm-mentorship
description: Skill for senior agents to instruct and upgrade the capabilities of junior agents during execution.

name: swarm-observability-sentinel
description: Skill for real-time telemetry, heartbeat monitoring, and distributed tracing across multiple agent worktrees.

name: swarm-orchestration
description: Directives for managing multiple subagents across parallel worktrees.

name: technical-storyteller
description: Skill for writing engaging, educational, and clear communication (PRs, Docs, Walkthroughs).

name: terminal-guardian
description: Expert skill for managing terminal processes, fixing port conflicts, and detecting hung builds.

name: test-grid-generator
description: Skill for automatically architecting and generating robust testing suites (Unit, E2E, Integration).

name: theme-system
description: Use when creating or modifying UI components, styling, or visual elements in OpenChamber. All UI colors must use theme tokens - never hardcoded values or Tailwind color classes.

name: todo-autopilot
description: Skill for autonomously managing session Todo items based on development progress.

name: ui-vision-verifier
description: Expert skill for verifying UI changes using browser automation tools.

name: ux-psychologist
description: Skill for applying cognitive psychology principles to UI design, optimizing for flow, focus, and delight.

name: vibe-consistency-checker
description: Automated visual audit skill. Ensures that new components perfectly match the existing "Maximum Vibe" design system.

name: vibe-polisher
description: Expert skill for creating premium, "Ultimate Vibe" UI/UX. Focuses on animations, glassmorphism, and responsive design.

name: zero-trust-sanitizer
description: High-security skill for sanitizing tool inputs and preventing "Prompt Injection" through file contents or command outputs.
